meta.description: Determine the most cost-effective way to meet nutritional requirements using four food options.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams per unit of each food.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams per unit of each food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content per unit of each food.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing the foods.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 94 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 191 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2271 calories are consumed.
